item.title: The LG Stylus 2 will make its first appearance at MWC 2016
item.description:
LG will introduce the LG Stylus 2 at the upcoming Mobile World Congress 2016 in Barcelona, Spain. Source: LG. The LG Stylus 2. The LG Stylus 2 is slimmer and lighter than its predecessor, measuring 7.4mm thick and weighing 145g. This follow-up to the G4 Stylus boasts a 5.7" HD display for an enhanced viewing experience. Using the LG Stylus 2 mimics the experience of writing with a traditional pen and notepad...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-lg-stylus-2-will-make-its-first-appearance-at-mwc-2016/
